figures.style module

Script contains the desired styling parameters for plots.

figures.style.close_fig(fig: figure, variables: list) → None[source]

Delete the figure and variables from memory.

Parameters:

  • fig (plt.figure) – The figure to close

  • variables (list) – The variables to delete

figures.style.set_style()[source]

Set the style of the plots.
